title: Thunder Cake
ingredients: 3 eggs separated (blend yolks in, beat whites until stiff, then fold in)
instructions: Cream together, one at a time: shortening, sugar, vanilla. Add 3 eggs separated (blend yolks in, beat whites until stiff, then fold in). Sift together flour, cocoa, baking soda, salt. Mix dry mixture into creamy mixture. Bake in two greased and floured 8 1/2-inch round pans at 350° for 35-40 min. Frost with chocolate butter frosting. Top with strawberries.
